      Constructors in com.anthony.chessgame.piece with parameters of type Piece.colorPiece 
      Constructor and Description
      Bishop(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Qw"/"Qb"
      King(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Kw"/"Kb", it is still(true) on creation
      Knight(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Qw"/"Qb"
      Nothing(int Px, int Py, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C=0[NEUTRAL] at COORDINATES(PX,PY), and his NAME stays " " from PIECE
      Nothing(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C=0[NEUTRAL] at POSITION P, and his NAME stays " " from PIECE
      Pawn(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Qw"/"Qb"
      Queen(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Qw"/"Qb"
      Rook(int P, Piece.colorPiece C)
      CONSTRUCTOR : create a PIECE of COLOR C at POSITION P, and his NAME becomes "Rw"/"Rb", it is IMMOBILE(false) on creation
